Articles.Content:
are there any guide for all the parameters which is appears there? for example, why there are 4 varibles where the rotation is determined? are'nt there just 3 euler angles?

& more things i cant remember, they are just seems unnecessery for running the game scense...

Where do you find the rotation variables? I'll have a look in my save file as soon as you tell me where.

As for the other things, if you don't remember them, we can't help

IT does't cover everything, but it's a start.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/CFG_File_Documentation
The four numbers are a quaternion representation of a rotation, which avoids the potential loss of a degree of freedom when using Euler angles, often referred to as gimbal lock.
